item.title: Thieving Chest
item.dc:creator: @coder_sal coder sal
item.description:
@coder_sal wrote:

Here is what I did. Made a void on it:

public void thievingchest() { if (playerHasItem(85)) { sendMessage("You've have access to the chest; searching.."); } }

Added the void to a chest of my choice:

if (objectID == 103) { thievingchest(); break;

Got an error.

Read full topic
